articles.title: India suspends visas for Canadians as row escalates - BBC
articles.description: Justin Trudeau said he was not trying to "provoke" India in the row over the killing of a Sikh leader.
articles.content:
India has stopped issuing visas to Canadian citizens amid an escalating row over the killing of a Sikh separatist on Canadian soil.
India said the temporary move was due to "security threats" disrup… [+4398 chars]

articles.title: Ubisoft announces Tom Clancy’s The Division 3 - IGN

articles.content:
